newsitem.title: USA: U.S. weekend box office chart -- April 18-20.
newsitem.headline: U.S. weekend box office chart -- April 18-20.

text.p: Following are the final data for the top 10 movies at the April 18-20 box office, according to Exhibitor Relations Co.
NOTE: "Anaconda" and "The Devil's Own" are released by Sony Corp..
"Liar Liar," "McHale's Navy" and "That Old Feeling" are released by Universal Pictures, a unit of Seagram Co. Ltd. .
"Murder at 1600" is released by Warner Bros., a unit of Time Warner Inc.
"The Saint" is released by Paramount Pictures, a unit of Viacom Inc.
"Grosse Pointe Blank" is released by Walt Disney Co. "Chasing Amy" is released by Disney's Miramax Films.
"8 Heads in a Duffel Bag" is released by Orion Pictures, a unit of Metromedia International Group Inc.
